MessageHistory.Text: We've been working together for a while now, and you've proven to be quite reliable.
If you're needing to order larger quantities of supplies, you can now organize an in-person meeting with me. Just send me a text.
I've received $225 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
You can pay off your debt by placing cash in my stash. It's behind Dan's Hardware.
The drop is ready. You can find it behind the western Gas-Mart

I need a dead drop:
5x Granddaddy Purple Seed
Working on it. Should be ready in around 2 hours 30 min
I've received $96 cash from you. Your debt is now $129
I've received $129 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
The drop is ready. You can find it on the east-exterior wall of Taco Ticklers
